doc.title: 3 Writers
doc.plot: Three struggling Screenwriters do whatever it takes to make it. Danny the most inspirational of the three, and married, must balance his endeavors with his marriage. He wants success, his wife Brooke wants sex. A never ending struggling for the two of them.

Three struggling Screenwriters do whatever it takes to make it. Danny the most inspirational of the three, and married, must balance his endeavors with his marriage. He wants success, his wife Brooke wants sex. A never ending struggling for the two of them.
